user_sentiment: Pragmatic and accepting. The user acknowledged the interruption without frustration and asked the agent to resume work, indicating confidence in the approach taken.
execution_quality: Partially successful but interrupted. The agent made good progress modifying the analysis script, adding new dimensions and organizing report generation, but the work was terminated before completion.
work_category: Data analysis enhancement and report generation. The agent was asked to expand analysis dimensions, run full dataset processing, and produce an org-mode report.
summary: The agent took the initiative to expand analysis dimensions and prepare report generation in org-mode format, working independently with multiple read-edit cycles to refine the script.
